mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (content, uid, bno) values (#{content}, #{uid}, #{bno})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set content=#{content} where rno=#{rno} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select u.uid, u.uname, u.uphoto, r.rno, r.bno, r.content, r.regdate from tbl_reply as r join tbl_user as u on r.uid=u.uid where r.bno=#{bno} order by r.bno desc, r.regdate desc
select bno from tbl_reply where rno = #{rno}
